sect1.title: Setting Up a &sle; 12-Based &imgserv;
sect1.para: It is recommended to use a dedicated machine for setting up a &sle; 12-based &imgsrv;. For a list of system requirements, refer to the &sls; 12 documentation at .
&slepos; 12 &imgsrv; is delivered as an extension to &sls; 12 SP2. There are two options for installing the &imgsrv;:

listitem.para: When performing a new &sls; installation, select &imgsrv; from the list of extensions.
If &sls; is already installed, you can use the &yast; registration module to install the &imgsrv;.

sect1.para: In both cases, make sure to install the SLEPOS_Image_Server pattern. For further information, refer to the &sls; 12 documentation at .

note.title: /var/lib/SLEPOS/ on Btrfs Subvolume
note.para: The /var/lib/SLEPOS/ directory can be hundreds of megabytes in size. If the directory does not reside on a Btrfs subvolume, zypper will include it into snapshots. To prevent this from happening and save disk space, make sure that the directory is placed on a Btrfs subvolume.
